# Engraved Circle of Protection (Law) (WondArch)
## Overview
**Engraved Circle of Protection (law):** This work is identical to an *[[Engraved Circle of Protection (Evil)_ (WondArch)|engraved circle of protection (evil)]]*, except that it provides protection from lawful creatures.

*Caster Level:* 5th; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Magic Circle Against Law (Spell)|magic circle against law]]**; Market Price:* 7,500 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 76
